ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: the Day a man will flee from his brother
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Man will fly from his brother,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: on the Day when each man shall flee from his brother,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: it will be such a day when a person will run away from his brother,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: On that day man will run away from his brother.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: That Day shall a man flee from his brother.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: The day on which a man shall fly from his brother,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: upon the day when a man shall flee from his brother,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: On the day when a man fleeth from his brother
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: on that Day a man shall flee from his own brother,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: On the Day whereon a man shall flee from his brother,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: the day when a man will evade his brother,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That Day shall a man flee from his own brother,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: That Day shall a man flee from his brother,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: on that Day each person will flee from his brother,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The Day when a person will flee from his brother.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: On the Day a man will flee from his brother
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [80:34]   the day when a man will flee from his [own] brother,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then explained when this will happen, saying: (On the day when a man) the believer (fleeth from his brother) who is a disbeliever
